description: This file provides backend API implementations for managing IP interfaces in a system, including creation, initialization, removal, registration of info, handling prefix and address instantiation, and synchronization with remote configuration storage. It manages data structures representing IP interfaces, IPv4 addresses, IPv6 addresses, and IPv6 prefixes, and interacts with configuration repositories and external data models.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE CosaIPCreate(VOID)
methods.description: Constructs a new IP data model object, initializing its function pointers and internal variables.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaIPInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the IP data model object by setting up configuration folders, retrieving existing entries, and setting up internal data structures for IP interfaces, IPv4 addresses, IPv6 addresses, and IPv6 prefixes.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaIPRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Cleans up and frees all resources associated with the IP data model object, including interface lists and configuration folders.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaIpRegGetInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Retrieves ip interface configuration from the persistent storage and updates internal data structures.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaIPv6PrefGenInstAlias(PCOSA_DML_IP_IF_FULL2 p_ipif,PCOSA_DML_IP_V6PREFIX pEntry)
methods.description: Generates and registers an IPv6 prefix instance and alias when a new prefix appears dynamically, updating the configuration store accordingly.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaIPv6AddrGenInstAlias(PCOSA_DML_IP_IF_FULL2 p_ipif,PCOSA_DML_IP_V6ADDR pEntry)
methods.description: Generates and registers an IPv6 address instance and alias for dynamically added addresses, updating the configuration store.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaIPRegAddInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pNextInsNumName,ULONG ulNextInsNum,char * pPreffix,ULONG ulUpperInsNum,char * pAlias,ANSC_HANDLE hCosaContext)

ctags.name: CosaIPRegAddInfo
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pNextInsNumName,ULONG ulNextInsNum,char * pPreffix,ULONG ulUpperInsNum,char * pAlias,ANSC_HANDLE hCosaContext)
